organic: Babu wani abu da za a yi, amfanin gonarku yana da kyau.
chemical: Babu wani abu da za a yi, amfanin gonarku yana da kyau.
Ana ba da shawarar ka ci gaba da abin da kake yi har zuwa wannan lokacin.

causes: Cutar ta haifar da naman gwari Puccinia Sorghi. Spores na wannan naman gwari na iya hawa nesa da iska da ruwan sama. Suna fara tsarin kamuwa da cuta lokacin da suka sauka a kan ganye na amfanin gona. kamuwa da cuta na biyu na iya faruwa saboda iska ko ruwan sama.

organic: Babu wani magani na madadin wannan cuta a wannan lokacin. muna sabunta tsarin a kai a kai, duba baya daga baya ko tuntube mu daga shafin taimako
chemical: Koyaushe la'akari da tsarin da aka haɗa tare da matakan rigakafi tare da maganin halitta idan akwai
Yin amfani da magungunan kashe fungi zai iya zama da amfani idan aka yi amfani da su a kan iri masu saukin kamuwa da cutar
A yi amfani da maganin kashe fungi a farkon kakar idan tsatsa za ta bazu da sauri saboda yanayin yanayi
Akwai magungunan kashe fungi da yawa don magance tsatsa, ana iya amfani da kayayyakin da ke dauke da mancozeb, pyraclostrobin + metconazole, pyraclostrobin + fluxapyroxad, don sarrafa cutar.
Misali na magani zai iya zama fesa mancozeb a 2.5g/l da zaran pustules sun bayyana kuma maimaitawa a tsakanin kwanaki 10 har zuwa flowering.

preventive_measures: Nau'in tsire-tsire masu tsayayya da tsire-tsire da ke samuwa a gida.
shuka da wuri don kauce wa yanayi mafi kyau ga cututtuka
amfani da gajeren lokaci iri da suka girma da wuri
Ka riƙa lura da amfanin gona a kai a kai don ka ga ko akwai alamun cutar, musamman a lokacin da sama ya yi duhu
Tabbatar da daidaitaccen takin mai magani tare da rarraba aikace-aikacen nitrogen
Shirya wani girbi na girbi tare da amfanin gona ba mai karɓa ba

organic: Babu wani magani na madadin wannan cuta a wannan lokacin. muna sabunta tsarin a kai a kai, duba baya daga baya ko tuntube mu daga shafin taimako
chemical: Koyaushe la'akari da tsarin da aka haɗa tare da matakan rigakafi tare da maganin halitta idan akwai.
Yin amfani da takamaiman maganin kashe fungi na iya zama da amfani idan aka yi amfani da shi a kan iri masu saukin kamuwa.
Ka tuntuɓi ƙwararrun mutane a wurin don sanin maganin da ya fi dacewa da cutar.
